titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries for the vessel HEY, DA!.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 9/26/1996--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries.
